channel.title: How many clients can you fit on your screen(s)?
channel.description: this is a small survey im doing to see about a project im currently working, this is the client fully extended and in view.

item.title: How many clients can you fit on your screen(s)?
item.dc:creator: @blade9670 blade9670
item.description:
@blade9670 wrote:

i can do 4 without overlapping because im like 1280x1024 something like that

Read full topic
item.source: How many clients can you fit on your screen(s)?

item.title: How many clients can you fit on your screen(s)?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Ok, well even with just the applet window I can only fit 1. That’s on a 17 inch monitor with 1024x768 resolution.[br][size=1]Posted on: 29 January 2007, 13:17:59[/size][hr][quote=“Darth_Afro56, post:5, topic:52978”]I can hold about 5-6.[/quote]
If you’re talking about the client when it shows just the login screen in its entirety without any overlaps at all then I find that insane. Even when I put my resolution to the max the 2 clients I had opened were having their login screens overlapping at the corner. =\

Read full topic
item.source: How many clients can you fit on your screen(s)?
